metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22960 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The parse function in llhttp < 2.1.4 and < 6.0.6. ignores chunk extensionswhen parsing the body of chunked requests. This leads to HTTP RequestSmuggling (HRS) under certain conditions.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
